text: Nicolas "Nick" Roberts (born ) is a Canadian male weightlifter, competing in the 94 kg category and representing Canada at international competitions. He competed at world championships, most recently at the 2011 World Weightlifting Championships. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2011 || align=left| Paris, France|| 94 kg ||143|| ~~147~~ || ~~147~~ ||34||170||180|| ~~185~~ ||32||323||31 |- |2006 || align=left| Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic || 94 kg || ~~140~~ || ~~140~~ || ~~140~~ ||---|| ~~170~~ || ~~170~~ ||170||35||0.0||--- |- ! colspan=13|Commonwealth Games |- |2010 || align=left| Delhi, India|| 94 kg || ~~140~~ ||140|| ~~145~~ ||||176|| ~~181~~ || ~~183~~ ||||316||5 |} ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male weightlifters Category:Weightlifters at the 2010 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for Canada Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
